name: SAW HELL
description:
Get ready for adventure playing as brave stump hero.

Will you be able to overcome all the obstacles avoid the traps and successfully break out of this hell?

Storyline:
The world has been taken over by mad scientist and his mechanical traps. A desperate plea for help sets stump. How far will Stump go to protect his world, forest, and his friends trees. Only you can save this world. Hurry before you run out of time! The road to redemption awaits you!

Features:

- Amazing art
- Hardcore levels that for sure will be not easy
- A lot of levels
- Oldschool soundtrack
- Explore locations with various traps
- Many funny elements and references to popular heroes

Would you try to pass this hell in this world?
